refsect2.title: e_load_book_source ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new EBook specified by source, and starts a non-blocking open operation on it. If the book requires authorization, presents a window asking the user for such.
When the operation finishes, calls the callback function indicating if it succeeded or not. If you don't care, you can pass NULL for open_func, and no action will be taken on completion.

listitem.simpara: a function to call when the operation finishes, or NULL
data to pass to callback function
A new EBook that is being opened.
